name: LOVE TRIANGLE
description: A love triangle is typically a romantic relationship involving three people. What if we use the word "love" to represent one person in this equation and then put those words into a specific formation where the tips meet the ends of the next, so that each one is touching the other two? What do we have? A visual representation of a love triangle. Notice the perfect triangle that forms within the negative space in the center. It's fun to find amazing word opportunities like this. It's not so often you come across word pairings that form shape based upon the very words used. I suppose this is another example of meta words or a meta word shape.
